mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t2.id as campusId, t1.url as campusUrl, DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') AS createTm, DATE_FORMAT(t1.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%m:%s') AS modifyTm, t2.name as campusName FROM news t1 RIGHT JOIN app_campus t2 ON t1.campus_id=t2.id where 1=1 order by t1.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( campus_id, url, create_time ) VALUES (#{campusId}, #{campusUrl}, now() )
mapper.update: update news set url = #{campusUrl}, modify_time = now() where campus_id = #{campusId}
